reuters.title: WICKES COS INC 4TH QTR SHR LOSS TWO CTS VS PROFIT 14 CTS
reuters.body: Oper shr three cts vs three cts Oper net 511,000 vs 550,000 Revs 19.7 mln vs 17.7 mln Avg shrs 15,777,000 vs 16,074,000 NOTE: Earnings exclude gains from utilization of tax loss caryforwards of 398,000 dlrs, or three cts a share vs 455,000 dlrs, or three cts a share Reuter 
